alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:09PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Crockett County through 500 PM CDT... At 409 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Ozona, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ozona, Ft Lancaster, The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2083 And Highway 405, The Intersection Of Highway 163 And Ranch Road 1973, I-10 Near The Crockett-Pecos County Line, I-10 Near The Crockett-Sutton County Line, The Intersection Of I-10 And Highway 290 and The Intersection Of I-10 And Highway 405. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 327 and 380. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
